column4: I installed network manager but I cant find it anywhere, can anyone tell me where it might have went?
I installed network manager in ubuntu but I cant find it anywhere, where can it be??
What do you mean? Are you looking for System > Admin > Network?
In general, if you open Synaptic, click on the program you installed, one of the tabs is "installed files" which will tell you where you can find the program.
